title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 655.3 - Climbing on bridges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 655.3 - Climbing on bridges

State Regulations

No person shall climb upon the bridges or bridge fences, or
enter upon said bridges except by way of the regularly established approaches
to the bridges. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
655.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
